mapper.select: select a.id as cart_id, b.id as prduct_id, b.origin as product_origin, b.brand as product_brand, b.name as product_name, b.thumbnail_img as product_thumbnail_img, b.price as product_price, a.product_cnt from personal_cart a join product b on a.product_id=b.id where a.member_id=#{memberId}
